text: The Adventures of Pluto Nash is an 1997 American science fiction action comedy movie. It was produced by Martin Bregman, Michael Scott Bregman and Louis A. Stroller and was directed by Ron Underwood. The movie was released on April 18, 1997 in North America. The movie received very negative reviews with a 6% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 12 out of 100 from Metacritic. The movie was a huge box office bomb, the movie grossed around $7.1 million and the budget for the movie was $100 million. The movie was nominated for 5 Golden Raspberry Awards. == Cast == * Alec Baldwin as Pluto Nash/Rex Crater * Randy Quaid as Bruno * Rosario Dawson as Dina Lake * Joe Pantoliano as Mogan * Jay Mohr as Tony Francis * Luis Guzmán as Felix Laranga * James Rebhorn as Belcher * Peter Boyle as Rowland * Pam Grier as Flura Nash * John Cleese as James * Burt Young as Gino * Miguel A. Núñez, Jr. as Miguel * Illeana Douglas as Dr. Mona Zimmer * Richard Raybourne as Bartender Phil * Kelsey Grammer as Michael Zoroaster Marucci (MZM) (uncredited) == Other websites == * Category:1997 comedy movies Category:1997 action movies Category:American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Comedy science fiction movies Category:English-language movies Category:FBI in fiction Category:Movies set in the future Category:Movies directed by Ron Underwood
title: The Adventures of Pluto Nash
